com.gamelanlabs.chimple2.core

Class ChimpleProgram

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.gamelanlabs.chimple2.core.ChimpleProgram
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Cloneable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Demo, MatlabChimpleProgram

    public abstract class ChimpleProgram
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Cloneable

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      java.lang.String tag
      The solver may clone() and run multiple instances of your ChimpleProgram in parallel, in which case it may write a solver-specific tag to each program.
      Zookeeper zookeeper
      The zookeeper is unique to this program -- even when a ChimpleProgram is cloned they do not share a zookeeper.

    • Field Detail

      • zookeeper

        public Zookeeper zookeeper
        The zookeeper is unique to this program -- even when a ChimpleProgram is cloned they do not share a zookeeper. This is generally the only Zookeeper instance that should ever exist (the only exception is if you are running multiple solvers in parallel).

      • tag

        public java.lang.String tag
        The solver may clone() and run multiple instances of your ChimpleProgram in parallel, in which case it may write a solver-specific tag to each program.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ChimpleProgram

        public ChimpleProgram()

    • Method Detail

      • run

        public abstract java.lang.Object run(java.lang.Object... args)
        To write a Chimple program, extend this class and implement the probabilistic program inside this function.
        Parameters:
        args - Static parameters that the solver will pass to your probabilistic program every time it's run.
        Returns:
        results Results that the solver will collect on every iteration.

      • cleanup

        public void cleanup()
        Perform cleanup (ie. close any GUI windows this program created, etc).

      • clone

        public ChimpleProgram clone()
        Implements Cloneable interface.
        Overrides:
        clone in class java.lang.Object
        Returns:
        clone

      • addEnergy

        public void addEnergy(double energy)
        Specify an internal cost function, from within the run() method of a ChimpleProgram.
        Parameters:
        energy - How much energy to add to this trace

      • tic

        public static void tic()
        Start a timer. Timers are stored on a stack, they may be nested.

      • toc

        public static double toc()
        Stop a timer.
        Returns:
        elapsed Time elapsed since tic() was called

      • tocPrint

        public static void tocPrint(java.lang.String desc)
        Stop and print a timer, prefixed with the passed description. For example, if you pass "Iteration 0: ", then the output will be "Iteration 0: 0.41238 seconds."
        Parameters:
        desc - Prefix for output

      • tocPrint

        public static void tocPrint()

      • triggerEndCondition

        public void triggerEndCondition()
        Trigger the solver's end condition, if it has one (solver- dependent).

                         int samples,
                         int spacing,
                         ChimpleProgram program,
                         java.lang.Object[] args,
                         CostFunction cf)
        Convenience function for running traceMH. Call this in your main() function (the harness), not your run() function (the probabilistic program)!

        spacing -
